skins.shipDescription: Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine ®C U-410.
skins.selfIntroduction: For an Iron Blood "wolf," I don't have much to boast about. I went on a few patrols and the odd rescue mission, but that's about it... I just wish my career would've ended out at sea instead of docked at port.
skins.acquisition: Formally, I'm the Type VIIC submarine U-410. But you, Commander, can call me whatever resonates with your heart. You heard that right: just let your heart decide. Hehehe~
skins.login: Oh, you're back. Ready to start chipping away at this mountain of paperwork?
skins.details: I think it's good for a submarine to act a bit more mysterious. Wouldn't you agree, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Sauerkraut juice is a great pick-me-up. Give it a try and see for yourself.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Penelope? Oh right, she works here too. Take good care of her, you hear?
skins.secretaryIdle3: You can't figure out what that report says? Let me see... What, I'm too close to you? Hmm... Well, my bad~
skins.secretaryTouch: Just give me the signal when you wanna slack off. Hehehe~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Are you saying you find my body "too good to pass up?"

skins.shipDescription: Happy Lunar New Year. Have you cooked up a scheme for this year's festival? Hehehe~ I'm of course talking about giving out New Year's gifts and hanging up decorations. I've devised a master plan of my own.
skins.acquisition: Happy Lunar New Year. Have you cooked up a scheme for this year's festival? Hehehe~ I'm of course talking about giving out New Year's gifts and hanging up decorations. I've devised a master plan of my own.
skins.login: While there's no huge stack of paperwork awaiting you, there's no shortage of other things we need to do.
skins.details: Can't think of a good present? Hmm. Might I suggest a handwritten letter? I think that gets your feelings across pretty well.
skins.secretaryIdle1: We were playing hide-and-seek earlier, and get this: U-81 hid herself inside a snowman. That girl is on a completely different level.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I wonder what Penelope's up to... I might just go and check.
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's really hard to hang these up on my own. Would you let me ride your shoulders, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Is this your idea of a New Year's gift?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Whoa there. A little too excited from all the festivities, aren't we?
